Talents.Name: Pure Water is Life
Talents.Description: Can summon a Flowing Shape to assist in combat. Flowing Shapes can partially copy an undeployed Operator's attributes (Max HP, ATK, DEF, RES, Block, Attack Interval, Attack Range, Damage Type, and obtain a special Trait depending on whether in melee or ranged form), will respawn 25 seconds after being defeated

Talents.Name: Expenditure Economization
Talents.Description: When in the squad, all [Rhine Lab] Operators have DP cost -2, and the first [Rhine Lab] Operator deployed has an additional -1 DP Cost
